sentences.en: Factory waste has smelled up the creek.
sentences.cn: 工厂的废物使这条小河臭气熏天.

sentences.en: Follow Austin Creek for a few miles.
sentences.cn: 沿着奥斯汀河走上几英里。

sentences.en: He moved into the creek, then up the other bank.
He was transferred to Shoal Creek Mental Institution for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他被转到了肖尔溪精神病院，要在那里无限期地呆下去。

sentences.en: I can hardly believe it's been over eight years since you used to go camping at Cedar Creek.
sentences.cn: 我几乎无法相信现在距离你过去常常去松溪露营的日子已经有8年多了。

sentences.en: I was going to bridge a little creek for it.
sentences.cn: 我要在一条小河流上建一座桥.

sentences.en: It was still light when we arrived at Lalong Creek.
sentences.cn: 我们到达拉隆溪时天还没黑。

sentences.en: One evening, crossing a small creek, he pulled the car off the road.
sentences.cn: 一天傍晚，他驶过一条小溪后把车停在了路边。

sentences.en: The creek became narrower and finally petered out.
sentences.cn: 支流越变越窄最后终于枯竭了.

sentences.en: The creek had eroded deep into the little gully.
sentences.cn: 泾水把那狭窄的河床浸蚀得很厉害.

sentences.en: The man had fallen into the creek and had sprained his ankle.
sentences.cn: 那人掉进了小溪,把脚踝扭伤了.

sentences.en: There were shiny pathches on the black creek.
sentences.cn: 在那黑色溪流的水面上有些闪光的斑点.

sentences.en: They used to take off their clothes and go skinny dipping in the creek.
sentences.cn: 他们以前常常脱了衣服在小河里裸泳。

sentences.en: Tomorrow would be his last run on the Mill Creek line.
sentences.cn: 明天将是他最后一次在密耳科立克线上行驶.

phrases.phrase: be up the creek informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 处于困境；怀孕；不正确的

phrases.phrase: up the creek 或 up the creek without a paddle 【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 遭遇困难，处于困境：处于困难的、不幸的或困窘的境况

trans.tran_cn: <英>小湾，<美>小河，小溪，〈废〉弯曲狭窄的通路，克里克人，克里克语
trans.tran_en: a small narrow stream or river
